name: KlerosGovernor
description: KlerosGovernor Note that this contract trusts that the Arbitrator is honest and will not re-enter or modify its costs during a call. Also note that tx.origin should not matter in contracts called by the governor.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

functionDecorators.name: setMetaEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Sets the meta evidence. Can only be called once. Convenience function that removes the need to precompute the deployed contract address for the metaevidence data.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The URI of the meta evidence file.

functionDecorators.name: changeLoserMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the losing party.

parameterDecorators.name: _loserMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: The new loser multiplier value in basis points.

functionDecorators.name: getSubmittedLists
functionDecorators.description: Gets the array of submitted lists in the session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _session
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the session.

functionDecorators.name: changeWithdrawTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Changes list withdrawal timeout. Note that withdrawals are only possible in the first half of the submission period.

parameterDecorators.name: _withdrawTimeout
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of withdraw period, in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: changeSubmissionDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Changes the value of the base deposit required for submitting a list.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionBaseDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: The new value of the base deposit, in wei.

functionDecorators.name: rule
functionDecorators.description: Gives a ruling for a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrator. The purpose of this function is to ensure that the address calling it has the right to rule on the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _ruling
parameterDecorators.description: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refuse to arbitrate".

functionDecorators.name: changeWinnerMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the winning party.

parameterDecorators.name: _winnerMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: The new winner multiplier value in basis points.

functionDecorators.name: submitList
functionDecorators.description: Creates transaction list based on input parameters and submits it for potential approval and execution. Transactions must be ordered by their hash.

parameterDecorators.name: _target
parameterDecorators.description: List of addresses to call.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: List of values required for respective addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Concatenated calldata of all transactions of this list.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataSize
parameterDecorators.description: List of lengths in bytes required to split calldata for its respective targets.

parameterDecorators.name: _description
parameterDecorators.description: String in CSV format that describes list's transactions.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFeesAndRewards
functionDecorators.description: Sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute. Reimburses contributions if there is no winner.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions to a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _session
parameterDecorators.description: The session from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the session which the beneficiary contributed to.

functionDecorators.name: getContributions
functionDecorators.description: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _session
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the session.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The position of the round.

parameterDecorators.name: _contributor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contributor.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentSessionNumber
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of the ongoing session.

functionDecorators.name: executeTransactionList
functionDecorators.description: Executes selected transactions of the list. UNTRUSTED.

parameterDecorators.name: _listID
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Index of the transaction from which to start executing.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of transactions to execute. Executes until the end if set to "0" or number higher than number of transactions in the list.

functionDecorators.name: getRoundInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the information on a round of a session. Note that this function is O(n), where n is the number of submissions in the session. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _session
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the session.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round to be queried.

functionDecorators.name: changeMetaEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: URI to the new meta evidence file.

functionDecorators.name: executeSubmissions
functionDecorators.description: Approves a transaction list or creates a dispute if more than one list was submitted. TRUSTED. If nothing was submitted changes session.

functionDecorators.name: changeSubmissionTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Changes the time allocated for submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionTimeout
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of the submission period, in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: changeSharedMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost when there is no winner or loser.

parameterDecorators.name: _sharedMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: The new shared multiplier value in basis points.

functionDecorators.name: getTransactionInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the info of the specified transaction in the specified list.

parameterDecorators.name: _listID
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

parameterDecorators.name: _transactionIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the transaction.

functionDecorators.name: fundAppeal
functionDecorators.description: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if at least two lists are funded. TRUSTED.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the current sesssion. Note that submissionID can be swapped with an ID of a withdrawn list in submission period.

functionDecorators.name: getExpendableFunds
functionDecorators.description: Gets the sum of contract funds that are used for the execution of transactions.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTransactionList
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws submitted transaction list. Reimburses submission deposit. Withdrawal is only possible during the first half of the submission period and during withdrawTimeout seconds after the submission is made.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: Submission's index in the array of submitted lists of the current sesssion.

parameterDecorators.name: _listHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of a withdrawing list.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfCreatedLists
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of lists created in contract's lifetime.

functionDecorators.name: changeArbitrator
functionDecorators.description: Changes the arbitrator of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrator
parameterDecorators.description: The new trusted arbitrator.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitratorExtraData
parameterDecorators.description: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

functionDecorators.name: submitEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Allows to submit evidence for a current session.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidenceURI
parameterDecorators.description: Link to evidence.

functionDecorators.name: changeExecutionTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Changes the time allocated for list's execution.

parameterDecorators.name: _executionTimeout
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of the execution timeout, in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfTransactions
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of transactions in the list.

parameterDecorators.name: _listID
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the transaction list in the array of lists.

functionDecorators.name: getSessionRoundsNumber
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number rounds in ongoing session.
